body.name: Ashton 4-In-1 Convertible Crib In Cherry, Greenguard Gold, JPMA Certified, Non-Toxic Finishes, Features 4 Mattress Height Settings, Made Of Solid Pinewood

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

features: 4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: A lifetime investment, the Ashton grows with your child, easily converting from a crib into a toddler, day and full-size bed. The toddler guardrail, stabilizer and full-size rail are sold separately

MEET YOUR CHILD’S NEEDS: With 4 mattress height positions, the Ashton can be adjusted according to the age of your baby. Set the mattress at the highest position for your newborn & lower it as your baby starts to pull up to a standing position

DURABLE & STYLISH: The Ashton is built out of solid reclaimed New Zealand Pinewood. With a classic design, this crib offers your little one a sleeping space that will never go out of style. Available in different finishes to match any nursery theme

SAFETY FIRST - ALWAYS: This crib is JPMA Certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM. All of our products are tested by 3rd party labs for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed CPSC and ASTM safety standards
KEY SPECS: The maximum weight capacity of the crib is 50 lbs. For the best fit, we recommend any Dream On Me or Evolur full-size, non-toxic, Greenguard certified mattress
body.description: The Dream On Me 4-In 1-Ashton Convertible Crib is a lifetime crib that gracefully matures with your child from infancy through childhood and adulthood. Durable yet stylish, this piece of nursery furniture grows with your child transitioning easily into a toddler bed, (Toddler bed rail sold separately) a daybed and full-size bed (full-size bed frame and mattress not included).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Dream On Me Ashton 5-in-1 Convertible Crib The Dream On Me Ashton 5 in 1 Convertible Crib is a stylish crib that is loaded with useful features. Several convertibility options means it grows with your child, it scores high on safety, and a classic design and several finishes mean you can mix and match to create the nursery of your dreams!
Convertibility Options That Keep Pace With Your Growing Child

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality for a very nice price!
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I originally bought this off Amazon because it was cheap and it looked nice. It felt a little risky getting it, when all the other "quality" brands were at least twice the amount. But, I only got this because my middle child was still in his crib, and I was tired of putting my youngest into a pack n' play, just waiting for the middle child to be ready for a toddler bed. So, cheap was a priority.I ordered this with Prime, but even still, it arrived FAST! Only 1 day passed between purchase and delivery. That was impressive, although I understand this might just be a factor of how close I live to whatever hub it shipped from. Maybe a lucky coincidence, but it still made my day.As for setup, I just finished putting it together about 10 minutes ago, and it really wasn't too bad. I did it by myself in about 45 minutes, and if I had made my spouse help, it would have taken maybe half the time. Everything was nicely packed in the box and labeled with little stickies for easy of setup. I was a little confused at first trying to find the instructions, but they are actually in the envelop attached to the spring board. (Also, this envelop is apparently supposed to stay attached to the spring board as a safety warning, but I took mine off before I realized that.)The instructions were very easy to follow, and everything was labeled well, so it was easy to find everything and put it together. You don't need ANY tools of your own to put this together.As for parts included, this only comes with the crib and day bed configurations, but can be converted to toddler bed (half railing) and twin bed if you purchase the conversion kits separately. It also seems to have four positions for the height of the mattress, and the bolts are easy to put in and remove when you want to raise and lower the mattress.After everything was put together for the crib, I did have one board left, which I'll have to store until later when I turn this into a day bed (or buy the toddler conversion kit).Honestly, this was a great find, and I'm so happy that I no longer have to put my littlest in a pack n' play anymore (without breaking my wallet in the process). I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a simple, cheap (not cheap quality) crib. I almost wish I had found this for my other kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Crib, Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I loved this crib. Easy to put together when I was 7 months pregnant and has held up really well. The black finish is soooo pretty and its a really sturdy crib. Customer service is great. I lost the hardware kit in a move and it was easy to get in touch to purchase another. I can't wait to get it set up again and convert it when my son is ready for his big boy bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Luxury Finish
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my baby boy nursery the color is so professional! This lightweight crib is so sturdy and the finish is amazing. The crib fit perfectly in the room with room to spare. The paint hasn't chipped or anything which is a plus in my book. I can't wait to watch it grow with him. I will definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars we did not open yet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Great Crib
reviews.reviewText: It's the real deal! Easy to put together and high quality! My Grandson loves it! I couldn't be happier with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Initial Thoughts UPDATE
reviews.reviewText: Baby isn't here yet, so I will review other aspects of the crib after we get to use it. Firstly, the assembly was fairly straight forward, however I've put together various pieces of furniture before so it wasn't that tough if you are familiar with this type of assembly. The crib seems to be made of very sturdy material, however since it came in a big box and was a little heavy, the box sustained damage as well as one piece of the front of the crib. I expected this, and was damaged most likely by the transporter and not at Amazon. The price was right at $109 as there were other similar cribs at a higher cost. I will review again after the little one arrives and we put it to use.Update: The crib is no longer needed since our little one is too big for it. It lasted and now has been passed on to a friend that is expecting a baby. Great value and sturdy. This crib was great for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Full review on Dream on Me Ashton 5-in-1 Convertible Crib
reviews.reviewText: The crib was delivered 2 days early, which was a plus. However, Upon this crib being delivered I was very worried. As the first two pictures show the packaging was completely damaged. On the side of the box was a rip/tear nearly from top to bottom. On top of the box I could see the box spring from the hole that was put in the box (I am guessing through transit).To my surprise and complete relief there was no damages to the crib itself. All of the pieces and hardware were still in great condition.I put this crib together myself which took me about 30-40 minutes tops. It may be a little easier with two people but it’s not impossible for one person to get it done (I am nearly 32 weeks pregnant btw).Once the crib was completely assembled i was very pleased with the quality of it. It is very sturdy and the wood it’s not cheaply made.The crib does convert to a toddler bed as well as a head and foot board for a full-sized bed. Now the crib does come with the bottom rail to convert to a toddler bed however, it does not come with the toddler bed guard rail as shown in some of the pictures. That is an additional piece you would have to purchase separately as well as the rails to fit a full-sized bed.Overall, I would highly recommend this crib. I was able to purchase it for $129.00 plus tax. Shipping was free with prime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute crib, shipping was fast and nothing was missing.
reviews.reviewText: Love the size and price. Great crib
Looks great, came as advertised, fairly easy to assemble. Baby isn't here yet so can't speak to comfort but everything we wished for at this point.
For the price you can't go wrong ..super sturdy and well built ..looks great
Easy assembling, nice design. So far so good

reviews.reviewTitle: The crib is sturdy and nice
reviews.reviewText: The crib is sturdy and nice. Wished they provided inserts to cover up the screw and empty drill holes to be used later on when converting the bed to the other options.
